Short: Indicates the race of the Patient.
Definition: Indicates the race of the Patient
Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
An Extension
Slicing Description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url
Constraint(s):
ele-1:All FHIR elements must have a @value or children {hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())}
ext-1:Must have either extensions or value[x], not both {extension.exists() != value.exists()}

Short: (USCDI) American Indian or Alaska Native|Asian|Black or African American|Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander|White
Definition: The 5 race category codes according to the [OMB Standards for Maintaining, Collecting, and Presenting Federal Data on Race and Ethnicity, Statistical Policy Directive No. 15, as revised, October 30, 1997](https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-1997-10-30/pdf/97-28653.pdf).
Condition(s):
ele-1:All FHIR elements must have a @value or children {hasValue() or (children().count() > id.count())}
ext-1:Must have either extensions or value[x], not both {extension.exists() != value.exists()}

Short: identifies the meaning of the extension
Definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
Comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition SHALL be a URI for the Structure Definition defining the extension.

Definition: Value of extension - must be one of a constrained set of the data types (see [Extensibility](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extensibility.html) for a list).
Binding Description: The 5 race category codes according to the [OMB Standards for Maintaining, Collecting, and Presenting Federal Data on Race and Ethnicity, Statistical Policy Directive No. 15, as revised, October 30, 1997](https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-1997-10-30/pdf/97-28653.pdf).
